description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在研習機器學習的基本概念、執行演算法、應用方法與其在工程與管理上之應用，課程內容包括:1. 機器學習基本概念與應用;2.機器學習演算法概論3.歸納學習演算法4.決策樹演算法5.案例式學習演算法6.專家系統建立7.機器學習應用方法8.機器學習論文導讀9.機器學習專題製作
description.en: The Machine Learning course is to introduce and study the machine learning concepts, algorithms, application methodologies and its applications on engineering and management. The course encompasses the following topics.1. Machine learning concepts and applications.2. Machine learning algorithms. 3. Inductive learning algorithms. 4. Decision tree algorithms. 5. Case-based learning algorithms. 6. Construction of expert systems. 7. Applications of machine learning. 8. Paper readings on machine learning. 9. Projects on machine learning.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解行銷通路之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路與行銷管理的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程，通路結構，通路行為，通路溝通，通路策略及通路續效評估等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in marketing channel. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making channel decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations, and a term paper.

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動必須結合這些相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質，提升企業競爭力。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於生產自動化及企業電子化之相關知識以及進行製商整合時所需之觀念及技術。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive，the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore ,  the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology for manufacturing automation and electronic business.

description.zh: 以矩陣的表示法介紹迴歸的模式，其內容包括： ‧簡單線性迴歸-簡單線性迴歸模式，估計子的推論，模式的診斷 和估計子的同步推論 ‧一般線性迴歸 ‧變異數分析與迴歸模式 ‧案例討論
description.en: Use matrix approach to introduced the regression model which includes： 1.Simple Linear Regression--Simple Linear Regression model, Inferences of estimators in regression models, Diagnostics and simultaneous Inferences. 2.General Linear Regression 3.Analysis of Variance and Regression Analysis 4.Case study

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，其中包括：一因子實驗 ‧區集和拉丁方格 ‧不完全區集設計 ‧多因子實驗 ‧部份因子實驗 ‧巢狀或階層實驗 ‧變異數分析 ‧迴歸分析 ‧交互變異分析
description.en: Introduce the experiment design methods and conclusion. Such as: one factor experiment, Latin square, Multi factors experiment, ANOVA, regression.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目標是提供修課者對多變量方法的理論了解與軟體工具，作為協助專業計畫或論文研究有關於多變量資料的分析。本課程內容為Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Principal Components, Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Clustering 等。課程內容除了理論介紹外，期刊論文應用的例子是本課程教材的另一特色。成績以專案報告、期中、期末考為評分依據。
description.en: Introduction & SAS,Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Means, Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Journal paper discussion-Multiple Regression, Principal Components, Journal paper, iscussion-PCAFactor Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Journal paper discussion-Discrimination & Classification, Clustering,Project

description.zh: 物流有隱含供應鏈的觀念，物流管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，整個配銷通路管理的整合性哲學。內容有物流構面、供應鏈、存貨決定、倉儲管理、運輸管理、訂單處理、資訊系統、全球物流等。
description.en: Logistics implies supply chain concept. Logistics management is an integrated philosophy to manage the total flow of distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The course includes dimension of logistics, supply chain, inventory decision systems, global logistics and manufacturing systems design.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討些最近發展之最佳化方法如模擬退火法，類種經網路，基因法則及塔布搜尋等。此外，相關之文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study some new optimization methodologies,like simulated aunealing, neural networks,genetic algorithm, and Tabu search. Becises, the related literature reviews and applications areas wii be focused.

name.zh: 數位化設計專案研究(二)

description.zh: 數位化設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved digitized design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 1.離散傅立葉變換2.快速傅立葉變換3.離散哈特萊變換4.與傅立葉變換相關之轉換5.天線與光學
description.en: 1.The discrete Fourier transform2.The fast Fourier transform3.The discrete Hartley transform4.Relatives of the Fourier transform5.Antennas and Optics

description.zh: 1.傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2.離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3.Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: (1)簡介 (2)光的偏振 (3)異向介質中的光波傳播特性 (4)Jones矩陣法 (5)液晶顯示器(6)液晶顯示器特性 (7)液晶空間光調制器 (8)液晶顯示器應用
description.en: (1)Introduction (2) Polarization representation (3) Optical wave in Anistropic media (4) Jones Matrix Method (5) Liquid crystal displays (6) Properties of liquid crystal display (7) Liquid Crystal Spatial Light Modulators (8) Applications

description.zh: (1)雷射基本概念 (2)電磁場與物質交互作用 (3)物質能階結構 (4)光在介質中的傳播 (5)光學共振腔 (6)泵浦過程 (7)穩態雷射性質 (8)瞬態雷射性質(含Q-開關及鎖模等) (9)雷射系統(氣體、固體、半導體雷射等) (10)雷射的應用(1)雷射基本概念 (2)電磁場與物質交互作用 (3)物質能階結構 (4)光在介質中的傳播 (5)光學共振腔 (6)泵浦過程 (7)穩態雷射性質 (8)瞬態雷射性質(含Q-開關及鎖模等) (9)雷射系統(氣體、固體、半導體雷射等) (10)雷射的應用
description.en: (1)Introductory concepts (2)Interaction of radiation with matters (3)Energy levels in materials (4)Propagation of light through media (5)Optical resonators (6)Pumping processes (7)Continuous wave laser behavior (8)Transient laser behavior (9)Various lasers (10)Laser applications

description.zh: 本課程是介紹基因工程學之基礎知識。內容包括寄主細胞的選擇：細菌、酵母菌、真菌等微生物或昆蟲細胞、哺乳類動物細胞等動物細胞或者是植物細胞。聚合連鎖反應、基因轉殖、質體轉型、病毒轉換、基因槍等常用的基因工程學之方法。
description.en: This course is to introduce basic knowledge of genetic engineering, including the selection of host cells, bacterial, yeast, fungi, insect cell, mammalian cell, or plant cell. The powerful methods of genetic engineering, including polymerase chain reaction (PCR), gene clone, plasmid transformation, virus transduction, and biolistics are also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉末冶金學"的學生，對粉末冶金製程與粉末冶金技術的應用有更進一步的認識。課程的安排在製程方面，強調粉末特性對粉末冶金製程的影響，成形模具的設計，燒結理論與現象，燒結体的後處理等。應用方面以本國現有的粉末冶金工廠與其製品為主，例如：機械零件、超硬工具材料、磁性材料、電接點材料、摩擦材料等製程的講述。
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Topic of powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 介紹高級發光材料及原理
description.en: special topics of luminescent materials

description.zh: 本課程著重於資源再生分選廠的設計與規劃，如何選擇各項機械，並利用電腦程式輔助以達成建廠設計的知識。
description.en: The objective of this class is to teach student how to design a process plant to conduct industrial waste recycling and reutilization.  The process unit selection and computer modeling and simulation will also be included in the design process.

description.zh: 本課程介紹水文地質的一般原理、概念和分析方法及地下水在實用上的一些問題。主要內容有: 水的來、源分、佈與循環、地下水的賦存、地下水的物理性質及化學成分、地下水運動的基本規律、地下的地質作用、地下水的補給、排泄與徑流、地下水資源概況，與地下水有關的環境問題，地下水與工程開發的工程地質問題，水文地質調查概要等。
description.en: The content of this class includes general principles, concepts of hydrological geology and analyzing methods for practical problem related to this subject. It includes: origin of water, distribution and circulation, reserve of underground water, physical and chemical properties of underground water and the relationship between hydrology and engineering geology.  It also discuss environmental concerns of engineering to the hydrology system.

description.zh: 探討物質表面之化學結構及性質，相關的理論基礎及技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the basic theories and techniques about the chemical structure and properties of material's surface.

description.zh: 本課程依物理處理技術、化學處理技術、生化處理技術以及高溫處理技術等四個方向介紹處理的基本原理與方法。
description.en: This class divide the mineral processing into four categories, i.e., physical process, chemical process, biochemical process, and high temperature process.  The basic principles and processing techniques that can be applied to the mineral processing will be discussed extensively.

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習嵌入式系統之硬體與軟體之設計技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹 (2)嵌入式系統應用 (3)嵌入式系統硬體 (4)嵌入式系統軟體架構 (5)中斷處理 (6)記憶體管理 (7)週邊應用 (8) 即時作業系統。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded system and learn the skill to design the hardware and software of embedded system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded System Introduction, (2)Embedded System Application, (3)Embedded System Hardware, (4)Embedded System Software Architectures, (5)Interrupts, (6)Memory (7) Peripherals, (8)Real-Time Operating System.

description.zh: 氣膠為懸浮在空氣中的微小固體或液體粒子。本課程深入探討氣膠科學（微塵學）及其工程上之應用。．氣膠理化特性，粒徑分布．氣膠運動學：擴散和布朗運動，過濾機制，荷電性質，熱泳等．光學特性及其應用．氣膠的測量原理與方法．大氣氣膠及生物氣膠
description.en: ．Indroduction:characterization of aerosols,shape and size distributions．Particle transport:Brownian motion and diffusion, centrifugation, intertia and filtration, convective diffusion,extermal forcr fields, thermal force．Optical properties:visibility, light scattering．Aerosol dynamics:coagulation, formation and growth．Atmospheric Aerosois and Bioaerosols．Measurement of aerosol

name.en: Control and Management of Industrial Air Pollution Sources

description.zh: 有關各種主要工業之製程，空氣污染來源，空氣污染物特性及其控制與管理方法。將配合台灣工業之現況及須求授課。本課將包括現場參觀及案例討論。
description.en: Analysis of industrial processes, estimatin f air pollutant emissions, maintenance and operation of air pollution control facitilities. Field trips to representative plants.1.Emission factors-determination and use.2.Adsorption control systems.3.Emissions in the utility industry.4.Emissions in the steel making industry.5.Emissions in the chemical/petro industry.6.Emissions in the paper indussstry.7.Emissions and air quality in the high-tech industry.8.Management of industrial Air Pollution Sources.Field trips

description.zh: 由於台灣地小人稠,為了更有效利用土地,達到更高之生產量,使得土壤污染問題特別顯得重要,因此整治土壤污染是刻不容緩.本課程對於土壤污染之整治由萃取,氣提,固定安定化,淋洗,電熔等物化方法傳授之,其次講授生物復育技術,最後以工程經濟角度,進行本益比分析。.
description.en: There are many remediate methods in this class.The methods include solvent extraction,air stripping,solidification/stabilization,solid flushing,and thermel treatment.This f topicalso includes bioremediation and cost effective analysis.

description.zh: 課程內容包高等控制策略，多變數控制系統，數位取樣，數位控制系統，模式識別，狀態變數。
description.en: An introduction to advanced control algorithms, multivariable process control, digital sampling, digital control system, model identifications, state variable.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎 1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質 1.2 遞迴關係之解        1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧 2.1 計算複雜度之上下限2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析 2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧 3.1 分擊法 3.2 貪婪法 3.3 動態規劃 3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度 4.1 資訊理論證明法 4.2 對抗式證明法 4.3 問題之線性轉換 4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background 1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions 1.2 Solving recurrence relations 1.3 Mathematical induction 2. Basic analysis techniques 2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds 2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis 2.3 Amortized analysis 3. Basic Design Paradigms 3.1 Divide and conquer 3.2 Greedy methods 3.3 Dynamic programming 3.4 Probabilistic algorithms 4. Computational Complexity 4.1 Information-theoretic arguments 4.2 Adversary arguments 4.3 Linear reduction of problems 4.4 NP-completeness

description.zh: 資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

name.zh: 模糊理論在災害管理之應用
name.en: Application of Fuzzy Theory in Disaster Management

description.zh: 模糊理論基本觀念模糊數學模糊多屬性決策分析應用實例分析
description.en: The course introduces fuzzy theory and related models to improve the effectiveness of disaster management. The main content includes concepts of logic, fuzzy set, fuzzy relation, fuzzy math, fuzzy logic, calculation principles, and some important performance evaluation methods and application algorithms which are often used with fuzzy theory. The course may help students not only touching the key concepts of fuzzy theory, but also independently doing deeper research in fuzzy, evaluation, and management field.

description.zh: 本課程是較大學部的「岩石力學」課程為之深入探討岩石行為的課程，將針對岩石的指數性質、透水性、強度及變形性做更詳細的研究，並將比較岩石和土壤的不同，以及介紹機率概念在岩石力學上的應用。上課時將以研究論文為主，，書籍、報告為輔，其涵蓋的課程內容大致如下：1、岩石的指數性質2、岩石和土壤的不同3、岩體分類法4、岩石的透水性5、立體投影圖6、岩石的強度7、岩石的破壤準則8、岩石的變形性9、弱面的分析10、機率在岩石力學上的應用
description.en: Compared to the undergraduate Rock Mechanics course, this is a more advanced course to examine the behaviors of rocks under different stress conditions。 It will focus on the index properties, the permeability properties, the strength properties, and the deformation properties of rocks。 In addition, it will address the difference between rocks and soils by contrast。 Finally, this course will introduce students to the concept of probability, and how it can be applied to the Rock Mechanics。 The students taking this course will have plenty of reading assignments, and are required to participate in the classroom discussions。

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

name.en: Applications of Computer Software for Engineering

description.zh: 土木工程涵蓋範圍廣泛，本課程主要著重於工程軟體之應用，務使學生熟悉1.結構設計各步驟之計算方式及其電腦程式之使用方法.2.教授學生自行準備輸入程式資料,並操件以求取結果.3.根據學生之電腦輸出結果或操作中之偵錯方法及結果正誤之研判方法。
1)簡介 (2)全像術原理 (3)薄全像片與厚全像片 (4)全像記錄介質(5)顯示全像 (6)電腦全像 (7) 全像術應用 (8) 全像實作
description.en: (1)Introduction (2) Principle of holography (3) Thin and thick holograms (4) Recording medium (5) Display hologram (6) Computer-generated hologram (7) Applications (8) Case study

description.zh: 1.探究Crystal Cycle 景氣週期循環2.探究光電產業關鍵零組件與材料產業的內容與現況3.熟悉與運用Porter五力分析、SWOT分析、與鑽石分析之研究工具4.趨勢量化研究工具SPSS之熟悉與運用5.技術創新機制模型之研發與運用6.專利申請之運用
description.en: 1.explore the Crystal Cycle of prosperity period2.	explore the contents and current of the key component and material in the Electro-Optical Industry3.know and apply the research tool of Porter's, SWOT's, and Diamond's for qualitative4.know and apply the research tool of SPSS for quantification5.develop and apply the model of the creative mechanism in technology6.perform the application of patent

name.zh: 鋼筋混凝土構件行為學

description.zh: 設計方法，材料性質，構件受壓行為，構件受拉行為，構件受撓行為，軸力和彎矩之聯合作用，構件受剪行為，構件受扭行為。
description.en: Behavior of Reinforced Concrete Frame   1.Method of Design2.Properties of Materials3.Compressed Behavior of Frame4.Tension Behavior of Frame5.Flexing Behavior of Frame6.Impact of Axial Force And Moment7.Shear Behavior of Frame8.Torsion Behavior of Frame

description.zh: 應用統計及機率推估水文變數及過程之不確定性，其中包含極端事件、模擬、取樣、預測及統計與機率理論。
description.en: Application of statistics and probability to uncertainty in the description, measurement, and analysis of hydrologic variables and processes, including extreme events, error models, simulation, sampling, prediction, statistics or probability theory.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程讓學習者熟悉電子商務之相關技術、議題、及應用，主要內容包括：電子商務的網路基礎建設，網路安全與防火牆，電子商務與全球資訊網，電子交易與電子付款系統，internet協定組，軟體代理人，行動計算基本原理，企業內網路及企業間網路，數位版權。
description.en: This course familiarizes the students with the techniques, issues, and applications of electronic commerce. Course content includes the infrastructure of e-commerce, network security and firewall, e-commerce and WWW, e-trade and e-payment, internet protocols, software agent, principles of mobile computing, intranet and extranet, digital copyright.

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5.分散式同作控制   6.電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1. Process synchronization 2. Concurrency Mechanisms 3. Virtual memory 4. Distributed Systems 5. Distributed Concurrency Control 6. Queuing Models

description.zh: 1.數位視訊的表示法 2.畫面內編碼 3.JPEC與JPEG2000 4.動作補償與畫面間編碼 5.視訊傳輸之漸進式編碼與強健性 6.合成影像之編碼7.多媒體資料索引與檢索8.智慧財產權的保護：浮水印與其他９.MPEG標準
description.en: 1.Representations of Digital Video2.Intraframe Coding3.JPEG and JPEG 2000Standards4.Motion Compensation and Interframe Coding5.Content-BasedScalability and Robustness of Video   Transmission6.Coding of Synthetic Video7.Multimedia Indexing and Retrieval8.IP Protection Techniques:watermarking and others9.MPEG Standards

description.zh: 本課程將介紹如何利用X-光晶體繞射方法以獲得高解析度蛋白質三維結構。課程內容包括蛋白質純化技術、晶體培養、繞射數據的收集及結構解析，並從各式各樣的結構來了解蛋白質的折疊方式、反應機制及其在生物科技上的應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce how to construct three-dimensional macromolecule structures by using X-ray diffraction method. This will include protein purification, crystallization, diffraction data collection and structure determination. This would lead to an understanding of the folding and reaction mechanisms of various proteins and its applications in biotechnology.

description.zh: 1. GPS 的緣起與發展2. GPS 的系統架構3. GPS 的時間與座標4. GPS 的定位原理與觀測量5. GPS 的誤差分析6. GPS 導航定位分法7. GPS 在測量的應用GPS 導航定位實習
description.en: 1. The origin and development of GPS.2. The structure of GPS.3. GPS time and coordination.4. GPS positioning principle and measurements.5. GPS error analysis.6. GPS in navigation.7. GPS in measurement.  8.GPS practice

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介2. 隨機程序3. 數位調變與多工技術4. 最佳接收器5. 載波與符碼同步6. 消息理論7. 訊源編碼8. 通道編碼9. 展頻通訊系統10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 1. 交流電機模型2. 磁場導向控制3. 電流型變頻器控制4. 電壓型變頻器控制5. 控制器參數調整6. 交流電機轉速估測
description.en: 1. MODELLING OF AC DRIVES2. VECTOR CONTROL OF AC DRIVES3. CURRENT SOURCE INVERTER CONTROL4. VOLTAGE SOUR INVERTER CONTROL5. PARAMETER TUNING OF CONTROLLER6. SPEED ESTIMATION OF AC DRIVES

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2.電力電子元件特性 3.元件與電路佈局4.元件特性與雜訊 5.元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.zh: 使學生熟悉主機板內之各項電子元件及數位高頻訊號設計
description.en: 1.	Introduction to Digital Systems Engineering 2. Packaging of Digital systems 3. Modeling and Analysis of Wires 4. Circuits 5. Power Distribution 6. Noise in Digital Systems 7. Signaling Conventions 8. Advanced Signaling Techniques 9. Timing Conventions 10. Synchronization 11. Signaling Circuits 12. Timing Circuits

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述設計研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in design research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 隨著網路時代的來臨，造成協同產品開發觀念的興起，也造成協同產品商務平台也逐漸成熟，使得同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。以實務應用而言，電子化產業經營管理的基礎建設必須涵蓋三種不同類型的管理技術：資料管理、構型管理與流程管理。本課程是從協同產品開發到協同產品商務概念之介紹開始，使學生明白協同產品商務的重要性，接著介紹如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置協同產品商務環境，並說明工作流程管理相關功能。
description.en: The increasing availability of Internet facilitates the notion of collaborative product development, and also enhances the emerging platform of collaborative product commerce. These factors move forward the realization of concurrent engineering. From the practical perspective, the electronic business management is based upon three kinds of managerial technologies, which embraces data management, configuration management and process management. In this course, we will introduce the nature of collaboration from product development to commerce, then demonstrate how to analyze the business model in order to construct the collaborative product commerce environment and their functions of task process management.

description.zh: 感性工學是一種關於「心理感受」與「實體物件」關係的人因工程研究，其不僅能幫助設計者了解使用者的感受和需求，對於設計元素的掌握與運用，也有指標性的作用。因此本課程對於此類問題上的解決及方法除了說明外也例舉相關應用實例以助瞭解。
description.en: Kansei is a Japanese term which means psychological feeling or image of a product. Kansei engineering refers to the translation of consumers' psychological feeling about a product into perceptual design elements. Kansei engineering is also sometimes referred to as "sensory engineering" or "emotional usability." In this course, we will focus on currently issues of Kansei engineering research and cases of using Kansei engineering to solve practical design problems.

name.zh: 生活資訊產品設計研究

description.zh: 隨著資訊科技的進步，資訊處理的功能被廣泛的加入到產品之中，成為典型的「互動系統」（Interaction System）。本課程重於使用者與資訊產品之間的互動介面設計。將探討到介面的使用是否容易；使用者是否能夠完成特定的工作等議題。討論的主題包括－認知模式、互動技術、符號系統、顯示螢幕的組織方式、以及數位原型建構方法。
description.en: With the progress of Information technology, the functions of information process have been added into appliance which is a typical interaction system. In the course, we will focus on issues related to interactive interface between information appliance and users. Those issues include cognition model, interactive technology, information architecture, and digital prototype.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹應用於工業或製程上之冷凍系統的原理設計與應用。主要內容包含: 製冰、溜冰場、食品製程、水壩建造與相關土木應用、化學工業製程、以及相關冷凍節能技術。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to introduce the principles of the refrigeration systems used in industrial applications. The topics of this course include the following: 1). Ice manufacture. 2) Ice rinks. 3) Food processing. 4) Concrete dams and subsurface soils. 5) Refrigeration in the chemical industry. 6) Energy saving technology.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程將深入的討論製程中材料之性質。尤其是在材料行為的理論推導方面。所涵蓋的主題包括有：塑性加工、顯微結構、強化機構、破壞力學、潛變與疲勞、材料之熱膨脹、熱傳導、電化學性質、擴散理論、相變化動力學、化學性質、以及材料之熱力學性質。
description.en: The properties of materials in service will be discussed in detail.  Special focus will be on the theoretically discussion of the behavior of materials.  Topics covered include plastic deformation、strengthening mechanisms、fracture、creep and fatigue、heat capacity、thermal expansion、thermal conductivity、the law of electrolysis、electrolytic conductance and transport, and ionic activity、reversible electrode potentials、Irreversible electrode processes、electrochemical measurements、kinetics of phase transformation、diffusion、kirkendall effect、thermodynamic properties of alloy systems、thermodynamics of surfaces and interfaces

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     1.分子動力學模式的建立  2.基本守恆律與週期性邊界  3.硬球模式  4.分子動力之差分邏輯  5.軟球模式  6.靜態性質  7.內能、壓力、均方根力、比熱、熵  8.軸向分佈函數  9.動態性質  10.時間相關函數  11.愛因斯坦關係式  12.格林-克伯關係式  13.擴散係數  14.黏性係數  15.動態結構（空間-時間相關係數）
description.en: 1.	Establishment of the Molecular Dynamic models 2.Conservative systems and periodic boundary conditions  3.Hard sphere model  4.Algorithms for Molecular Dynamics  5.Soft sphere model  6.Static Properties  7.Internal Energy, Pressure Mean Square for 4, specific heat, Entropy  8.Redial distribution Function  9.Dynamics Properties  10.Time Correlation Function  11.Einstein Relation  12.Green-Kubo Relation  13.Diffusiaity 14.Viscosity  15.Dynamic Structure(Space-Time Correlation)

description.zh: 本課程分三單元，包括：(1)奈米薄膜製程與檢測技術：奈米薄膜之定義、種類，奈米薄膜特性與應用，奈米薄膜製程，物理蒸鍍法，化學蒸鍍法，超微結構之觀察、微區/微量之化學組成分析，微奈米材料之機械性質檢測，微奈米材料之磁性、光、電性檢測，微奈米材料檢測所需試片之加工技術。(2)奈米生物科技：細胞生物學，分子細胞生物學，病毒，DNA與蛋白質操控，光電生物技術，奈微米製程技術，生物高分子監測系統整合實例介紹，專題報告。(3)矽奈米電子元件：奈米矽技術簡介，奈米矽元件前瞻物理，各種奈米電子元件可能之應用，奈米矽元件之電特性量測，專題報告。
description.en: (1) Nano Thin Film Processing and Characterizations: Definition classification, characteristics, and applications of nano-film, fabrication process, the related metrology and analysis tools of nano material. (2) Nanobiotechnology: Introduction of cytobiology, molecular cell virus, manipulation of DNA and protein, optoelectronics metrology on biotechnology, nano/micro fabrication technology, case study of biopolymer detection system. (3) Sliconnano electronic device: Introduction of nano silicon technology, advanced physics of nano silicon device predicted applications of variety of nano electronic device, electrical measurement of nano silicon device.

name.en: Advanced Integrated Circuit Fabrication Process and Lab.

description.zh: 前段製程：包含物理沈積、化學沈積、微影、蝕刻等製程。深入探討最新的製程技術及研究方向。後段製程：包含各種IC封裝的技術及測試方法、並深入探討最新的研究方向。
description.en: Review of the basic IC fabrication Process, Study the state of art of the Fabrication Process, especially about technology and facilities. Including PVD, CVD, doping heat process.

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 先修課程：統計學基礎統計介紹、一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、隨機化區集法、拉丁方格法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor, two-factor, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized block design, Latin square, and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括Wavelet轉換、變分法及積分方程等工程分析之技術，且以Matlab軟體來應用至影像處理、噪音振動、最佳控制、偏微分方程等工程應用實例。.
description.en: Including Wavelet transform, Variation principle, and integral equation Engineering Analysis technology, try to use Matlab software apply to Image processing, denoise, optimal control, and solving partial differential equations.

description.zh: 基礎流體力學原理及實驗、比例閥、伺服元件、電液元件及比較、伺服驅動器設計等實驗(作)。
description.en: A general background in fluid mechanic and use of mechanical laboratory machinery equipment. The course Hydrau-servo Systems introduces the varied aspects of Pneumatic and Hydraulic Servo System Servo and Proportional Valves, Electro-hydraulic Servo-valves, Electro-hydraulic Servomechanisms and Hydra-mechanical Servo-mechanisms. The course in programming is one third time of lectures and the other of laboratory practices.

description.zh: 精確度、重覆性、精密度及解析度等、彈性變形及動態特性、背隙摩擦及動態特性、系統補償、精密機構及動態分析。
description.en: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。工程最佳化方法導論、線性規劃法、非線性規劃法、多目標函數最佳化、近代數學規劃法介紹、精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods, Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization, Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Techniques, and Optimum Design of Precision Machine Components and Systems.

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。一、幾何光學：光學基本定律、球面光學系統成像、雷射光傳播特性、光纖、輻射度學與光度學。二、物理光學：光的電磁理論、光波的疊加與分析、光的干涉與干涉儀、光學鍍膜、光的繞射、光的偏振、晶體光學基礎。
description.en: A、 Geometrical optics 1.Basic optical laws 2.Paraxial systems 3.Laser beams 4.Optical fiber 5.PhotometryB、 Physical optics 1.EM waves of light 2.Superposition of light waves 3.Interference and interferometer 4.Optical coating and thin film 5.Diffraction 6.Polarization 7.Light in crystal

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種常用之進階影像處理理論，課程內容含蓋：１. 空間域影像強化２. 頻域影像強化３. 影像還原４. 彩色影像處理５. 型態學影像處理６.影像分割 7. 物件辨認 8. 小波理論
description.en: This course contains the advanced topics in digital image compression. It includes １Image Enhancement in Spatial Domain ２. Image Enhancement in Frequency Domain ３. Image Restoration ４.Color Image Processing ５. Morphological Image Processing ６. Image Segmentation 7. Object Recognition 8. Wavelet and Multiresolution Processing

description.zh: 1.數學基礎  1.1函數成長率之漸近性質  1.2遞回關係之解  1.3數學歸納法2.基本分析技巧  2.1計算複雜度之上下限  2.2最差情況分析及平均情況分析2.3動態平均分析  3.基本設計技巧  3.1分擊法  3.2貪婪法  3.3動態規則3.4隨機演算法  4.計算複雜度  4.1資訊理論證明法  4.2對抗式證明法4.3問題之線性轉換  4.4完全NP
description.en: 1.Mathematical background  1.1Asymptotic growth rate of functions  1.2Solving recurrence relations  1.3Mathematical induction  2.Basic analysis techniques  2.1    Computational complexities -lower bounds and upper bounds  2.2Worst case analysis and average case analysis  2.3Amortized analysis  3.Basic Design Paradigms   3.1Divide and conquer  3.2Greedy methods   3.3Dynamic Programming  3.4 Probabilistic algorithms  4.Computational Complexity 4.1Information-theoretic arguments  4.2Adversary arguments   4.3Linear reduction of problems  4.4NP-completeness

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.天線基礎2.長導線天線3.孔徑型天線4.陣列分析與合成5.自阻抗與互阻抗6.信號饋入結構
description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

description.zh: 知識管理是二十一世紀知識與學習型企業發展知識經濟最主要的技能，而營建與土木工程是一個需要專業知識的技術型產業，故亦應融入知識管理之理念。本課程基於上述理念，分別介紹營建興土木工程之相關專業技能，知識管理與企業e化發展技術，進而探討營建導入知識管理之技巧與方法。
description.en: Knowledge Management(KM) is the most important technique of learning type business for developing knowledge economy in the 21st century.Construction and civil engineering need to conduct knowledge management due to they are complex and full with professional techniques.This course will introduce related professional techniques of construction and civil engineering,the development technology of knowledge management and a e business,also will illustrate the conducting methods of construction knowledge management.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming、network analysis、dynamic programming、game theory、(non)Integer linear programming、markov chains (markovian decision process)、queueing theory、inventory models、forecasting models、decision analysis and system simulation

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題如：1.全球運籌之產業環境；2.全球運籌之經營模式與績效衡量；3.全球運籌之運作模式；4.全球運籌之4PL；5.全球運籌與之其他相關議題，如物流、金流及通關等；6.案例研討；7.我國全球運籌管理之未來發展。
description.en: This course includes following sections:1.Global logistics environment;2.Global logistics business model and performance   evaluation;3.Global logistics operation model;4.4PL in global logistics environment;5.Other issues related global logistics, like logistic flow   and customer;6.Case study.7.The furture trend of R.O.C. global logistics managment.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標為如何將高階語言轉換為機器碼的理論。主要內容容包含 1. 語句分析 2. 語法分析 3. 中介碼產生 4. 碼最佳化 5. 產生目的碼
description.en: The major goal of this course introduces the theory to convert a HLL into object code. The major content is as follows: 1. Lexical Analysis 2. Syntax Analysis 3. Intermediate code Generation 4. Code Optimization 5. Code Generation

name.zh: 微奈米量測系統與技術

description.zh: 微奈米量測工程技術為是現代科技發展之重要前瞻技術，它將探討有效尺寸在微奈米等級範圍之精密量測儀器與技術. 本課程將涵括下列各項現代精密量測主題:1.近代光電量測系統與技術2.量測統計原理3.量測信號處理4.三次元座標量測系統與技術5.雷射干涉系統與技術6.影像量測系統與技術7.微奈米量測系統與技術-干涉術、相位移術、調變術、光共焦 及   自動聚焦術8.微奈米量測系統與技術--掃瞄探針顯微鏡(SPM), STM, AFM 及   SNOM.9.奈米粉體量測系統與技術10.量測實驗11.小型量測儀器之專題製作
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced systems and technology associated with micro- and nano-scale measurement. The subject includes the following subtopics:1.Modern opto-electro measurement systems and techniques2.Statistic principles for measurement3.Signal processing techniques4.Three-dimensional measurement systems and techniques5.Laser interferometric metrology and systems6.Image processing techniques for metrology7.Micro and nano-measurement systems and techniques (I) -   Moire interferometry, phase shifting, signal modulation,   confocal and auto-focusing techniques.8.Micro- and nano-measurement systems and techniques (II) -   SPM, STM, AFM and SNOM.9.Nano-particle measurement systems and techniques10.Student laboratory/practices11.Team project work for design and fabrication of    small-scaled measurement instrument

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹微處理系統的介面設計。其中包括記憶體介面，一般的輸出輸入介面以及CPLD/FPGA介面。由於CPLD與FPGA大量應用在嵌入式系統中，如何利用微處理器的彈性軟體設計，搭配CPLD/FPGA的高速運算能力，將是本課程的重點。
description.en: Interfacing between microprocessor and peripheral will be discussed in this course.  The interfacing technique includes memory interface, general peripheral and CPLD/FPGA devices.  A large number of industrial applications have applied CPLD/FPGA into their design.  This course will also focus on integrating of microcontroller and CPLD/FPGA devices by taking advantages of the flexibility of microcontroller and high speed calculation capability of CPLD/FPGA devices.

description.zh: 一、 簡介二、 數學模式三、 小信號干擾之系統響應四、 同步機之模擬五、 同步機之線性模式六、 激磁系統七、 激磁對穩定度之影響八、 多機組系統之穩定度
description.en: 一、 Introduction二、 The Mathematical Model三、 System response to small disturbances四、 The simulation of synchronous machines五、 Linear Models of synchronous machines六、 Excitation System七、 Effect of excitation on stability八、 Multimachine Systems with constant Impedance loads

description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Optimal Control 的理論基礎與其應用﹐範圍從古典的早期發展到最新的進展都包括在內，其目的在使同學能具有最佳控制器設計能力。 內容包括: 最佳化問題求解、線性二次調整器設計、線性二次高斯觀測器設計。此外，現代控制中常用的loop shaping及loop transfer recovery技術亦將在課程中介紹。預修課程 ： 線性控制系統(可同時修)、工程數學
description.en: 1.	Introduction.2.	Mathematical preliminaries for optimal control.3.	Classical linear quadratic optimal control, including regulation & tracking control.4.	Observer based optimal control (LQG control). 5.	Loop shaping and LTR control.  This is a course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to design an optimal controller for linear systems with a specific performance index. Concepts such as optimality condition, linear quadratic regulation (LQR), and linear quadratic gaussian (LQG) problem are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also includes the loop shaping concept and the loop transfer recovery (LTR) technique which are frequently used in the modern control.

description.zh: 1.簡介2.實體層  (數位及類比資料傳輸,媒體)3.媒體存取層  (區域及廣域網路,IEEE802協定,光纖及MAC子層)4.鏈路層  (錯誤更正,流量控制,滑窗協定,協定效應,)5.網路層  (網路層組織,Routing,阻塞及相互連接)6.傳輸層  (傳輸提供之服務,傳輸層之元件)7.會議層  (資料交換,交談處理,同步)8.展現層  (資料表現,壓縮,網路安全及隱私)9.應用層  (檔案傳輸,電子郵件,虛擬終端機)
description.en: 1 INTRODUCTION 1.1 Network goals 1.2 Applications of networks 2 THE  PHYSICAL LAYER3 THE  MEDIUM  ACCESS  SUBLAYER4 THE  DATA  LINK  LAYER  4.1 Error control 4.2 Flow control  4.3 Link management5  THE  NETWORK  LAYER     5.1 Services  provided to  the       transport layer   5.2 Routing  congestion  5.3    Internetworking6 THE  TRANSPORT  LAYER  6.1 Services provided to the session   layer  6.2 Connection management7 THE SESSION LAYER  7.1 Data exchange  7.2 Dialog management  7.3 Synchronization

description.zh: 1. 變頻器2. 電力轉換器3. 直流截波器4. 電源供應器
description.en: 1. INVERTER 2. CONVERTER 3. DC CHOPPER 4. POWER SUPPLY

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程將基本物理化學原理應用在材料科學上，探討電子組態、化學鍵及晶體結構間之關係。內容包括晶體結構、X 光繞射分析、相平衡、材料之光學及電學性質及材料表面之鑑定及分析。
description.en: This subject covers the basic principles of physical chemistry and shows how they apply in describing the behavior of the solid state. The relationship between electronic structure, chemical bonding and crystal surface is developed. Attention is also given to characterization of atomic and molecular arrangements in materials as well as quantum optical and electrical effects in nanoscale materials.

description.zh: 利用單元介紹的方式，將生物化學、微生物學、分子生物學、基因工程等原理，應用在微生物或蛋白質品種改良上，並介紹生物活性物質，如氨基酸、抗生素、免疫體、酵素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、抗體等之製造方法。
description.en: Biotechnology applications in mutant microbial and protein productions are to be introduced based on the knowledge of biochemistry, microbiology, molecular biology, and genetic engineering, etc. This course also introduces the productions of some living blocks, such as amino acids, antibodies, enzymes, hormone, proteins, lipids, etc.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 本課程係利用統計原理來有效的設計並分析實驗。一個實驗的結果或結論決定於實驗數據資料之蒐集。良好的實驗設計應符合以下原則：實驗過程及材料之選擇應力求隨機，實驗因子之效益應力求精確，避免誤差發生。因此，實驗設計之研究領域包括：單因子實驗設計、變異數分析、多因子實驗設計、平方和及預測平均值平方數之方法，迴歸分析法之應用，共變數分析等。因範圍廣泛，本課程可依大學課程標準，以介紹學生認識實驗設計之基本方法為主，修習本課程應具備基本的統計概念，如：常態、T分配、CHI平方、F分配、信賴區間及一般假設檢定觀念。
description.en: Introduce the experiment design methods and conclusion. Such as: one factor experiment, Latin square, Multi factors experiment, ANOVA, regression.

description.zh: 結合工作衡量之基礎及人事管理之應用，並使用工業工程之基本管理知識，使學生瞭解績效管理之概念、程序、方法及步驟，達成最終提昇工作績效之目地。
description.en: Combining the work measurement and personnel management applications to make the students realize the concept、procedure、methods of performance management. To improve performance of work is the target of this course.

description.zh: 1.策略管理者的特徵責任及風格 2.企業環境的偵察 3.策略形成 4.策略執行與評估 5.資訊科技與管理，高科技公司與多國籍企業的策略管理
description.en: This course attempts to define and analyze many the issue and function involved in management. The objection is to provide a set of frameworks for the development and analysis of strategic planning. The course seeks to structure the key dimension and the process of the strategic planning.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

description.zh: 探討產品機能和成本配合的關係，綜合企業內所有知識和技能，做有系統、有組織的設計、材料種類、與型態改善，以達成降低成本，提高製程功能和品質。
description.en: Value Management (VM) is an organized, systematic approach to obtaining optimal value for every industry. The learning and training topics are: the system approach, opportunities, application and methodology for value management. Also, involve managing project value through lift cycle costing, problem solving and project value and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程中說明如何網路創業，並包括實際操作。
description.en: The course is teaching how to initiate a business on the internet.

description.zh: 透過講課、討論、專題報告的方式，瞭解投資的擬定、報酬與風險分析、執行與評估方法，並探討不同因素對投資之影響，期提供良好的投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course lies in definition of investment, return and risk analysis, investment execution and evaluation methods. Various factors that affect the investment decision problems are discussed to help decision-maker properly resolves investment decision-making.

description.zh: 本課程包含ERP系統演進，全球運籌管理，ERP系統軟硬體結構，及企業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在研習機器學習的基本概念、執行演算法、應用方法與其在工程與管理上之應用，課程內容包括:1. 機器學習基本概念與應用;2.機器學習演算法概論3.歸納學習演算法4.決策樹演算法5.案例式學習演算法6.專家系統建立7.機器學習應用方法8.機器學習論文導讀9.機器學習專題製作
description.en: The Machine Learning course is to introduce and study the machine learning concepts, algorithms, application methodologies and its applications on engineering and management. The course encompasses the following topics.1. Machine learning concepts and applications.2. Machine learning algorithms. 3. Inductive learning algorithms. 4. Decision tree algorithms. 5. Case-based learning algorithms. 6. Construction of expert systems. 7. Applications of machine learning. 8. Paper readings on machine learning. 9. Projects on machine learning.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解行銷通路之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路與行銷管理的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程，通路結構，通路行為，通路溝通，通路策略及通路續效評估等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in marketing channel. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making channel decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations, and a term paper.

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動必須結合這些相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質，提升企業競爭力。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於生產自動化及企業電子化之相關知識以及進行製商整合時所需之觀念及技術。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive，the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore ,  the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology for manufacturing automation and electronic business.

name.zh: 電腦整合製造系統之設計與分析
name.en: Design and Analysis of a Computer Integrated Manufacturing S

description.zh: 本課程主要內容在介紹產品在製造期間就整個製造過程，裝配組合，物料搬運以及品管檢驗等生產活動相關的實體活動利用電腦的控制來整合其執行工件
description.en: This course is to provide students with the concept，design and analysis of a Computer－integrated manufacturing system。 Its content covers manufacturing operations，assembly/joining material handling process and test/inspection。

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討模擬學基本理論如模式化方法資料分析、分配之選定及判別、模擬進行、及結果分析。此外，相關文獻及運用領域將深入探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the fundamental of simulation,such as modeling approch, data analysis, selection and testing of distribution,simulations,and output analysis. Besides, the related literature reviews and applications areas will be focused.

description.zh: 以矩陣的表示法介紹迴歸的模式，其內容包括： ‧簡單線性迴歸-簡單線性迴歸模式，估計子的推論，模式的診斷 和估計子的同步推論 ‧一般線性迴歸 ‧變異數分析與迴歸模式 ‧案例討論
description.en: Use matrix approach to introduced the regression model which includes： 1.Simple Linear Regression--Simple Linear Regression model, Inferences of estimators in regression models, Diagnostics and simultaneous Inferences. 2.General Linear Regression 3.Analysis of Variance and Regression Analysis 4.Case study

description.zh: 本課程的主要目標是提供修課者對多變量方法的理論了解與軟體工具，作為協助專業計畫或論文研究有關於多變量資料的分析。本課程內容為Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Principal Components, Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Clustering 等。課程內容除了理論介紹外，期刊論文應用的例子是本課程教材的另一特色。成績以專案報告、期中、期末考為評分依據。
description.en: Introduction & SAS,Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Means, Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Journal paper discussion-Multiple Regression, Principal Components, Journal paper, iscussion-PCAFactor Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Journal paper discussion-Discrimination & Classification, Clustering,Project

description.zh: 物流有隱含供應鏈的觀念，物流管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，整個配銷通路管理的整合性哲學。內容有物流構面、供應鏈、存貨決定、倉儲管理、運輸管理、訂單處理、資訊系統、全球物流等。
description.en: Logistics implies supply chain concept. Logistics management is an integrated philosophy to manage the total flow of distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The course includes dimension of logistics, supply chain, inventory decision systems, global logistics and manufacturing systems design.

description.zh: 本課程內容共分零售基本概念、零售規劃技巧、零售機構之管理、零售之行銷組合及零售之應用與未來趨勢等五篇。第一篇「零售基本概念」，介紹零售的本質，描述零售機構的型態及台灣零售業之發展與未來趨勢。第二篇「零售規劃技巧」，說明如何訂定零售策略及進行零售研究，闡述商圈規劃與分析，並且探討零售地點選擇的決策流程與評估技術。第三篇「零售機構之管理」，先敘述零售組織規劃，然後討論零售業人力資料管理的程序及重點，也論及零售機構財務規劃、分析及預算制度。第四篇「零售行銷組合」，以行銷組合（產品、訂價、通路及促銷）之概念，分別討論店面設計與商品展示、商品採購與管理，零售訂價技巧及步驟，零售促銷規劃與活動。第五篇「零售之應用與未來趨勢」，將零售管理之學理及概念應用於更廣泛之場合，包括直接銷售（Direct Selling）及綠色零售（Green Retailing），最後針對零售管理之未來趨勢探討科技應用在零售管理，網路行銷及虛擬商店。
description.en: There are five sections in this course. The first section；the basic concepts of retailing which the fundamental concepts, the models of organization and the future tendency are introduced. The second section；the skills of retailing planning, the strategy and research are discussed. The analysis of business circle and store location are decided by several different technologies. The third section；the way of establishing organization and managing the human resources, the financial planning, and budgeting are included. The fourth section；the combination of marketing, the concept of 4P（product, price, path and promotion）, the shop design and product demonstration, produce purchasing and managing, the decision of price and the activities of promotion are included. The fifth section；the future implementation of retailing, the direct selling and green retailing are included. The use of high-tech in retailing, Internet marketing and virtual store are discussed in this section.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括Wavelet轉換、變分法及積分方程等工程分析之技術，且以Matlab軟體來應用至影像處理、噪音振動、最佳控制、偏微分方程等工程應用實例。.
description.en: Including Wavelet transform, Variation principle, and integral equation Engineering Analysis technology, try to use Matlab software apply to Image processing, denoise, optimal control, and solving partial differential equations.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 導論及AI之工業應用、類神經網路及專家系統搜尋法則、敘述邏輯、驗證、機器學習。
description.en: Introduction of AI in industrial applications, Neural Networks, Searching algorithm of expert systems, Statement logic, Testing, Machine learning.

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意建立法律之基本概念與法律應用之知識，實務之科技企業經營與法律策略之整合。依據科技產業對法律知識需求之特性，概分三大類：(1)科技法律，包括智慧財產權，網際網路與電子商務法律，網路犯罪，智權契約與授權，企業智權管理等，(2)財經法律，包括國際經貿(WTO)爭端解決，國際投資與併購，證券交易，大陸投資等法律，(3)爭端解決機制：訴訟與偵查搜索程序，仲裁，調解，協商談判等
description.en: This course aims to make students realize basic law concept and common sense of law application, simultaneously to integrate between practical technology business management and law strategy.  According to need for technology industries in the respect of law, this course is divided into three parts: (1) Technology Law - including Intellectual Property Rights, Network and Electronic Business Law, Network Criminal, etc. (2)Financial Law - including laws  of WTO dispute resolution, international invest & acquire, stock trade, Investment in PROC, etc. (3) System of Dispute Resolution etc.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.無線通訊系統簡介2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹3.無線電通訊的傳播原理4.行動通訊之調變技術5.行動通訊之多工技術6.天線﹑多元性與系統分析7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼8.無線網路系統9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

description.zh: 1.政府採購法簡介 2.標準作業模式 3.特別採購模式 4.建築師及工程顧問之甄選及聘用 5.公平合約之訂定 6.異議申訴制度 7.其他
description.en: the management of financial affairs1.	the introduction of government purchasing law2.	standard working model3.	specific purchasing model4.	the choose and employ of architect and engineering consultant5.	the making of fair restrict6.	the making of reporting objection 7.	others

name.zh: 建築施工災害與應變措施
name.en: Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures

description.zh: 基礎開挖施工作業的災害最主要的是擋土牆的傾倒,這是源自於隆起、砂湧及管湧的現象。開挖區的土壤為砂土,如果擋土牆漏水,由於淘空所形成的管湧,會導致鄰房的損壞;由於擋土牆貫入深度的不足以及點井措施的不良,會造成開挖區的砂源,最終導致擋土牆的傾倒。開挖區的土壤如果為粘土,而且粘土含水量大於液限,則開挖區的粘土產生塑性液,使支撐系統挫屈破壞,最後造成擋土牆的破壞。這些原理皆為課程的內容。此外,當基礎施工災害的機制了解之後,再講授如果發現災害的徵兆,如何採取必要的緊急應變措施, 使災害消失於無形,這些應變措施分別按照技術及行政層面來敘述。
description.en: 英文名稱:Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures  The hazand during foundation excavation is retaining wall failure, this may be caused by heaving、boiling and piping。If excavation is conducted in granular soil in which retaining wall is found leaking, the migration of silty soil will trigger piping and eventually wall failure。 If excave embedded depth of retaining wall and point walls are insufficient, this can cause boiling and lead to wall failure。 If encavation is in cohesive soil and water content is higher than liquid limit, plastic flow will lead to huckling of bracing system and to the wall failure。 After the various failure mechanisms are explained, how to identify the symptoms and how to take urgent remedial measures both technology and administration are explained accordingly。

description.zh: 高性能混凝土之特性，材料，配比設計及試驗，品質管制，施工規範及構件行為。
description.en: This course focuses on the characteristics of high performance concrete, composition materials, mixture design and testing, quality management, construction specifications, as well as structural behavior.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 本課程從車輛的發展史出發，介紹車輛從性能的追求、低公害污染、省能源化、輕量化和環保政策等，到當今世界能源石化燃料危機以及原物料的短缺所衍生的問題，使未來車輛的研究發展條件更趨嚴苛。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the history of the vehicle development. This course contains numerous subjects as follow: vehicle performance, low pollutants, energy economy, light weight, environmental policy, etc. Students will understand the basic knowledge of the future vehicle development.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 冷凍設計、庫體設計、保溫與防漏設計、熱負荷計算、溫濕度控制、除霜設計與控制、氣流設計、性能分析
description.en: Refrigeration design, structure design, insulation and vapor barrier design, heat load calculation, temperature and humidity control, defrost design and control, airflow design, performance analysis

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 本課程主要包含四部份，分別為基本有限差分法、流體力學與熱傳方程式的有限差分法應用、有限體積法、格點產生法。
description.en: This course comprises four parts. Part one is fundamentals of finite-difference methods. Part 2 is the application of finite-difference methods to the equations of fluid mechanics and heat transfer. Part 3 is finite-volume method. Part 4 is grid generation.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

name.en: Non-eelctric Power Air Cond. Energy saving Tech.

description.zh: 非電力空調節能技術在與傳統利用機械壓縮式系統比較下，具有實質提供冷熱與電力的低成本、高效率之最佳經濟上特性。本課程內容將涵蓋： 1.吸收式系統技術 2.各式燃料電池﹝Fuel Cell﹞的連結應用技術 3.氫氣引擎的應用 4.MHD-磁動力流體發電技術 5.各種非電力空調技術評估 6.系統的最適化設計
description.en: The overall purpose of Non-electric Power Air Cond. Energy Saving Technology: 1.The Concept of Absorption Heat pump tech. 2.Fuel Cell System integration with Cogen. Sys. 3.Hydro-engine utilization tech. 4.Tech.of M.H.D. power generation. 5.Evaluation Tech for Non-electric Power Air Cond. Sys. 6.Optimize Design of Non -electric Power Air Cond. Sys.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming、network analysis、dynamic programming、game theory、(non)Integer linear programming、markov chains (markovian decision process)、queueing theory、inventory models、forecasting models、decision analysis and system simulation

name.en: Seminar of Services Marketing and Management

description.zh: 本課程主要研討服務行銷與管理，內容包括：（1）服務分類（2）服務接觸（3）服務品質（4）服務環境（5）服務失誤（6）服務補救（7）服務策略（8）顧客滿意（9）顧客價值管理（10）服務定價。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）servicescape, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）customer value management,（10）service pricing.

description.zh: 介紹資訊整合與交換的概念。藉由作業程序的改造及資訊技術與標準的運用，將業務上所必要的資訊電子化，標準化，以建立全球共通商業系統的無紙作業環境
description.en: Introduce the idea of information integration and exchange for the commercial environment. Also, by applying the business procedure re-engineering and information technology to establish necessary standard for paperless commercial environment.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為沿續教育統計學（一）課程，探討教育問題進階研究，所需之統計理論與方法。課程內容含卡方檢定法、多因子變異數分析、趨向分析、共變數分析、因素分析及無母數統計考驗等。
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course contains include Chi-square techniques, multivariate analysis of variance, trend analysis, covariance analysis, factor analysis and nonparametric tests.

description.zh: 研究虛擬學習系統組成要素的發展背景、現況與未來，並探就不同生涯階段的學習者，運用虛擬學習系統的成功學習策略。
description.en: In-depth study of the fields of virtual learning. Topics include the components of virtual learning systems, development background, current status and perspective of virtual learning. Exploration of successful strategies for learners' using virtual learning systems in different career stages.

name.zh: 媒體與科技在遠距教育之應用
name.en: The Application of Media & Technology in Distance Education

description.zh: 研究電訊傳播系統、虛擬教室教學系統，隨選視訊教學系統等遠距教育系統的現況與發展，並研討學校遠距教育系統的規劃與教學策略設計。
description.en: Exploration of current status, development and perspective of distance education systems for instruction, including telecommunication systems, virtual classroom instruction systems, and video on demand instruction systems. In depth study of the planning of curriculum and instructive strategies in distance education.

description.zh: 教學心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派；教學領域的探索，教學效果影響變項的探索；教學心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢。
description.en: Examination of peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on instructive psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches to instructive, cognitive approaches to instruction, and other related instructive theories, types of instruction, variables that affect instruction, and applications of instruction theories.

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

name.en: Studies in Strategies of Instruction in Technical-Vocational

description.zh: 探討技職教學策略理論，並以課程分析、學校需求等因素為基礎，決定技職教學目標、教學內涵。並進行教學評鑑。
description.en: Trends in methodology for designing, and evaluating instruction in technical-vocational education at vocational high school and community college levels.

name.zh: 技職教育課程設計研究

description.zh: 探討課程設計理論並以職業分析、社會需求等因素為基礎，決定技職教育課程目標、課程內涵，並進行課程評鑑。
description.en: Exploration of theories of curriculum design as well as objectives, contents and planning of curriculum in technical- vocational education that meet society needs and career analysis. Critical Analysis and evaluation of curriculum in technical-vocational education.

name.en: Studies in Evaluation of School in Tecgbucal

description.zh: 探討技職學校評鑑理論，並以學校本位與需求為基礎，決定技職學校教育目標、辦學內涵。並進行學校評鑑。
description.en: Trfends in methodology for designing, and evaluating schoolin technical-vocational education at vocational high school and community college levels.

name.zh: 當代技職教育思想研究
name.en: Study of Contemporary Technical-Vocational Education Thought

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前技職教育思想重要課題，並挑選有興趣之子題提出心得報告。
description.en: Exploration of concepts and current issues underlying from major research on contemporary technical-vocational education thought. Discussion and selected topics research are required.

name.en: Administrative Management & Decision Making in Technical

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對技職行政組織、管理模式與決策原則進行個案探討。
description.en: Exploration of research in administrative organization, management models and principles of decision making in technical-vocation education. Case study, group discussion and reporting are required.

name.en: Study of Leadership in Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程目標在研究技職學校領導原理與實務，課程內容包含課題討論、小組討論與個案研究。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the principles and practices of leadership in technical-vocational education. Case study, group meeting, and selected topics research are required.

description.zh: 以系統方略思考組織成長的動態歷程，研究組織內學習行為的變遷；包含個人、小團體，乃至群體間之智能之成長。
description.en: To study dynamic process of organization development by system approach thinking focusing on changing of learning behavior, including multi intelligent development of individual, small team, and group members.

description.zh: （一）認識人力資源發展策略之理論知識；（二）培養人力資源發展策略的能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展與組織策略之關係、人力資源發展實務模式分析、員工訓練發展之方法、組織發展策略、高階管理人員發展、跨文化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、企業參觀及個案研究等方法實施之。
description.en: An in-depth examination of planning, theories, and implementation in strategies of human resource management. Topics include staffing, development, appraisal, and rewards. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and case study.

description.zh: 研討內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探討、生涯決定因素、生涯技巧、生涯角色調適、生涯選擇與規劃技巧、生涯訪談、生涯高原調適、性別和職業歧視、雙生涯家庭、就業準備等主要生涯的研究與實作。
description.en: In-depth study of research in career development & guidance. Topics include an introduction to career idea, the exploration of interest, personality, and view of value, decision making of career, techniques of career development, adjustment of career role, choice and planning of career, interview, adjustment of career highness, adjustment of changing role, discrimination of gender and job, a family of two career parents, job preparation.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究--教育發展策略

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育教學發展策略，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in education development strategy. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research in education development strategy and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育校園環境，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in campus settings. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究--學校公共關係

description.zh: 研究生提出學校公共關係有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in school public relations. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in school public relation. Outcomes include the writing of research.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 為使學生對高分子物理有所認識，本課程之設定將涵蓋所有高分子物理之相關課題，其主要內容分以下兩大部份(I)高分子之非結晶性質(II)高分子之結晶性質。而兩大部份中，又各分以下數單元講述:(I) 高分子之非結晶性質(a) 高分子鏈之機率結構(b) 分子鏈之運動方式(c) 高分子熱力學(d) 自由體積理論(含Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ之探討)(e) WLF經通曲線(II)高分子之結晶性質(a) 結晶晶格之分析(b) 高分子結晶度及順向度之估計(c) 結晶度對高分子機械性質，導電性質，及熱性質之影響(d) 溶液晶體與熔融晶體之比較(e) 熱結晶及張力結晶之比較
description.en: This course is designed to make students theroughly understand the problems related to polymer physics. The main content will include two major topics:(I)Amorphous Polymer(II)Crystalline Polymer.The detailed items included in the course are:(I) Amorphous Polymer (a) Random-Walk Theory for Chain Configuration(b) Chain Conformation and Movements(c) Polymer Thermodynamics(d) Free Volume Theory (including the study on Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ…etc.)(e) WLF Master Curve(II)Crystalline Polymer(a) Unit Cell Analysis(b) Polymer Crystallinity and Orientation Measurement(c) Effect of Crystallinity on Mechanical, Dielectrical, and Thermal Properties of Polymeric Materials (d) Solution Crystals vs. Melt Crystals(e) Thermal Induced Nucleation vs. Stress Induced Nucleation.

description.zh: 介紹高分子材料：如纖維、塑膠、橡膠、生醫高分子化合物等之合成、性質、鑑定和應用。
description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of polymeric materials. The various types of organic materials such as fibers, plastics, rubbers and biomedical polymeric compounds will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論2. 景觀生態設計理論3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討如何結合硬體建設與柔性需求的社區規劃，以創造理性生活空間。並從都市規劃設計、公共安全、社區結構過程與社區組織等不同層面聯繫建築與都市設計議題，探討社區發展問題與對策。課程內容主要包括：1.社區定義、相關理論、形成、類型、環境問題及改善策略。2.社區建設與發展之規劃主題。3.社區鄰里單元規劃、土地細分與計畫整合單元開發、國民住宅社區  規劃。4.社區管理與維護。5.社區規劃/社區營造與民眾參與。6.社區規劃與社區文化、生活品質及防災。7.社區規劃實務：實例探討。
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the way of community planning is          concerned with achieving a between physical creativity and well-being of   the community and to explore the development issues and strategies to cope with. Thus the course including : 8.Definitions, theories, genesis and morphology of the community.9.Issues and strategies of community development and planning.10.Neighborhood nuit planning land subdivision and unit development planning and public housing community planning ..etc11.Management and maintenance of community.12.Community planning development and public participation.13.Community planning and culture living quality as well as public safety.14.Community planning practice.

name.en: Special Topics on Geographic Information System

description.zh: 本課程重點在訓練學生如何學習使用地理資訊系統的軟硬體設備，作為空間規劃與設計決策支援的工具。內容涵蓋相關理論及實務，範圍包括：一、	地理資訊系統的定義與發展二、	地理資訊系統的架構與功能三、地理資訊系統在空間規劃與設計上之應用四、地理資訊系統相關軟體之操作五、實務應用
description.en: The course designed is to help students to utilize the GIS environments to produce a better decision-making when dealing with space planning and design issues. Both related theories and applications of GIS are introduced.  The content of the course include:1.The definition and development of GIS2.The mainframe and functions of GIS3.The applications on space planning and design of GIS4.The introduction and operation of GIS software5. Applications practice.

description.zh: 「學校」（本課程特指『小學』）並非一單純的設施名稱，而是包含了老師與兒童、學生等人的群體、教育制度－特別是指與學習及教育系統的關聯性、及反映社會與文化背景之整體環境。本課程之內容，初期幾次先說明建築計畫的基本概念及近年來的轉變，以作為理解建築計畫學之基礎。而後進入授課主題，先嘗試從學校的基本知識，即從「教育」、「班級」、「課程」、及「教室」等教育用語之歷史性的考察為起始，了解近代「教育」與「學校」之發展過程。進而以目前國內外教育改革的主要課題－開放教育與開放式學校作為討論的重心。最後以與學校建築相關之各種的研究觀點與方法，及以學習與生活場所為基礎之學校環境論等的論述為總結，期望藉此作為將來學校建築規劃設計之參考。
description.en: It's not a name of facility simply, for a school. Schools are the integral environment where contain the users of teachers and children, education system, and reflecting social and cultural background. The contents of this course that firstly; explain the basic concepts and the transition in recently of Architectural Planning. Secondly, interpret the historical meaning and the transition of radical educational wordings in schools, such as "education", "class", "curriculum", "classroom" etc, in order to understand the processes of development in schooling. Besides, discuss the issues of educational reforms that focus on the open-education and open-school. Lastly, review different approaches to the researches of schools. For the practical planning and design for schools; meanwhile as the conclusion of this course, discussing the theory of school environment base on the point at issue that school is the learning and living places.

description.zh: 設計之本質在建構新經驗，創造即做出新經驗，新經驗是未知，未知的求解即「解題」，經由主體的解題思考模式推演而得。對於主體而言經驗是相對的，經驗無法直接傳遞，必須經主體與客體間之交互建構，內化後才能成為主體之經驗。空間結構為一意義表達之外顯形式，創作者藉由此表層結構傳達其新經驗。此新經驗必須建構於創作者意識內於先，是為深層結構，再依此深層之意義形諸於外。因此創作者應是在從事一系列的行為，包括建構一意義之深層結構至轉化成一傳達意義之表層結構。 誘導式結構為一主體的「解題」思考模式；從已知成份著手分析歸納，以推論那尚未知悉的成份，終而掌握所欲追求之「解」。這種認知是在主體內經由誘導式結構.操作模型之引導，自「不知」轉為「知」，使主體在已知與未知之間搭建其誘導式結構。本理論授課分為：課程一，「誘導式結構理論」課程二，「誘導式結構理論應用」
description.en: HS is a thinking model for problem solving, an analysis of the 'known' in order to master the 'unknown' to solve the problem.  The subjective party's cognition is guided by the HS manipulating model, the transfer from 'unknown' to 'known', lets the subjective party construct a heuristic structure in between known and unknown.  The HS theory instruction consists of two courses 1,"The Heuristic Structure Theory"2,"The Application of The Heuristic Structure Theory"

description.zh: 本課程主要講授建築+都市設計之理念（A + U），並給予學生作適當的練習，模型製作與電腦模擬，讓研究生藉由此門課程之訓練能深入瞭解建築形式與風格、建築街道景觀及其他等之練習。實習內容：1. 建築與都市設計管制模擬：含開放空間、建築形式、量體、人行系統、汽車出入口及其他等，以一個已實施都市設計管制區為例，調查及分析該區建築的整體風貌。2. 建築與街道景觀設計綜合實習：綜合練習建築與街道景觀之設計，含街道空間之地景設計實習。

name.en: An Advanced study on green Building

description.zh: 一、教學目標：1.	學習且體認國內外綠建築、環境共生建築及永續經營建築之課題與本質。研討國內外對其課題之解決方法，並培養研擬課題與本土化規劃設計方法之能力。二、教學內容：1.	綠建築、環境共生建築、永續建築之內涵。2.	研討地球環境、人類生活環境及建築環境之相互關係。3.	研討環境共生與綠建築之本質。4.	研討綠建築與生命週期各階段之環境課題。5.	研討國內外綠建築規劃、設計技術及解決方法。6.	研討綠社區、綠都市之發展規劃。
description.en: 1.	The contect of Green Building, Symbiosis Building and Sustainable Building.2.	Study of relation between globe environment, hurman life environment and architecture environment.3.	The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

description.zh: 為使都市安全防災的理論與實務能相互結合，特別以921震災後之重建為主題，作為實務訓練，所以本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。第二部份為都市與都市計畫防災，此部分從防災理論著手，逐漸導入都市計畫防災實務，最後提出防災都市計畫作業的方式與內容，期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。
description.en: The subject will be presented in three partsPart One - (1) Literature retrospection; (2) Fundamental planning for disaster prevention; (3) An integrated disaster prevention organization.Part Two -The major contents to be addressed include (1) Formation of urban disaster cataclysm and risk; (2) Urban disaster prevention plan and regional disaster protection system planning; (3) Principles for planning disaster prevention system in urban plan; (4) Operational standards and organization for urban disaster prevention; (5) Operational guidelines for urban disaster prevention; (6) Realization and formation of trouble free urban plan.Party Three -. The major contents are (1) Introduction; (2) rehabilitation theory; (3) Current development in Tsaotun City; (4) Establishment of damage survey method and rehabilitation procedures; (5) Detail analysis of damage survey report and preparation of rehabilitation plan content

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討台灣地區從日據時期至民國八十年代都市規劃範型的演變，內容包括各歷史階段中的經濟、社會及政治背景的主要特徵，以及對應在都市規劃作業上的實際狀況。並藉由案例分析，使學生更深入認識都市規劃的本質及其背後各種支配力量和限制因素。
description.en: The course mainly explores the urban planning history during last one hundred years in Taiwan. The changing paradigms and the social, economic, and political contexts of each time period are discussed.In addition, many planning cases are analyzed to obtain the better ideas of what the characteristics of urban planning, the dominated powers behind, and the limitations are.

name.zh: 製造科技特論及實驗(二)
