name.en: Special Topics and Experiments of Manufacturing Technology (

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程包括理論與實務，由製科所教授共同開課。第二學期探討的範圍包含製造設備、量測與檢測，側重在與製造業相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course includes theories and experiments, is conducted by several professors of institute of manufacturing technology. In second semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of manufacturing equipment, measuring and inspection, emphasizing in professional knowledge of manufacturing industry.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的系統及方法。包括：三D工件建圖、設計計算及分析、製造實驗及分析、軟體寫作、網路、NC程式寫作、製程模擬、智慧型製程控制及優化、電腦整合製造系統。
description.en: Introducing the system and methods about computer aided design and manufacturing. Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，此包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系
description.en: "Resource Recovery and Managemet" is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consist of approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

description.zh: 建議先修課程：流體力學、水文學、統計學資料研析方法、水文統計與迴歸分析、小流域洪水推估(含基本水文系統實驗)、基本水文系統實驗、頻率分析(2)、水文演算、水力演算、降雨逕流模擬、地理資訊系統(GIS)結合地文單位歷線(GIUH)、序率水文模式，HEC-2,6 講解與實習、專題討論
description.en: Prerequisite(suggested) : Fluid mechanics, Hydrology, StatisticsIntroduction, Data error analyses, Hydrological statistics, Frequency analyses, Stochastic analyses, Hydrological routing, Hydraulic routing, GIUH plus GIS, Small watershed flood prediction(including Lab. experiment), Seminar.

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

name.zh: 細菌生理學與生化工程

description.zh: 細菌為基因工程中最常用的寄主細胞。在生化反應器中扮演一個個小反應器，生產人類所要的產物。這個小反應器中的變化當然影嚮產物的製程。本課程即是介紹與生化工程相關之細菌生理。包含生長速率控制、嚴酷環境回應、熱休克回應、DNA修復等。
description.en: Bacterial is the most common host cell of genetic engineering. It plays a tiny reactor in bioreactor to generate our desired products. The change of this tiny reactor, physiology, has influence on the process. This course is to introduce bacterial physiology related to biotechnology. It includes growth rate control, stringent response, heat shock response, DNA repair and so on.

description.zh: 介紹高分子材料：如纖維、塑膠、橡膠、生醫高分子化合物等之合成、性質、鑑定和應用。
description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of polymeric materials. The various types of organic materials such as fibers, plastics, rubbers and biomedical polymeric compounds will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

name.en: Special Topics in Molecular Cell Biology

description.zh: 本課程討論細胞培養與基因工程技術之原理與應用，課程內容包涵下列主題：(1) 微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之特性 (2)細胞於生物反應器的培養，包括各式生物反應器介紹、生物反應器動力學、生物反應器之操作與控制 (3)基因重組蛋白之表現，將包涵不同的細胞載体表現系統 (4)實例探討，如單株抗體、生物高分子材料、基因治療載体等之生產。
description.en: This course discusses the principle and applications of cell culture and molecular biology.  The course covers the following topics: (1) characteristics of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells; (2) cell culture in bioreactors, including descriptions of bioreactor types, operation modes, bioreactor kinetics, and instrumentation and control; (3) expression of foreign genes in various cell systems; (4) case studies, such as production of monoclonal antibody, biopolymers, and gene therapy vectors.

description.zh: 學生們為研究必需習得的日文能力，此課程包含：(1) 日文閱讀與其文法(2) 紡織術語、複合材料、半導體、生物化學等日文(3) 最近科技研究開發之日文資料
description.en: This course has been designed to provide students essential Japanese language ability for advanced study. The course covers:(1) Japanese reading and its grammar(2) Textile terminology, composite, semiconductor, and biochemistry in Japanese. (3) Japanese references of the latest scientific and technological research and development

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意（1） 瞬時平面運動學：Hartman構圖法,反曲點元，切線圓，Euer- Savary方程式，Bobillier構圖法，四連桿組耦桿之直線包絡線方程式，                      Higher Curvature（2） 平面連桿機構分析：Freudenstein方程式，速度及加速度，傳遞角與機械利益，多迴路連桿組分析（3） 其它機構分析：凸輪，齒輪組，非圓形齒輪
description.en: （1） Instantaneous Plane Kinematics:       Hartman's construction, Inflection circle ,Tangential circle ,Euler -Savary Equation ,Bobillier's construction, Higher curvature （2） Analysis of plane Linkage:        Freudenstein Equation, Velocity and Acceleration, Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage, Multiple-Loop linkage （3） Analysis of Cams, Gear Trains, Non-Circular Gears.

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在設計一個嵌入式系統時，如何同時考慮選擇與設計系統軟體及硬體之方法，課程內容如下：1.介紹軟硬體共同設計之基本概念2.嵌入式系統之系統設計3.系統設計步驟4.系統功能最佳化5.系統功能及結構最佳化6.結構之最佳化7.軟硬體之共同合成及評估8.系統功能及結構最佳化及共同設計之流程9.合成之結果
description.en: The goal of this course is how to design and select the hardware andsoftware parts for designing an embedded system. The contents of this courseare shown as follows :1.Introduction to Hardware-Software Co-design2.Ststem Level Design of Embedded Systems3.Design Representation4.Function Optimizations5.Function/ Architecture Optimizations6.Architectural Optimizations7.Hardware/software Co-synthesis and Estimation8.Function/Architecture Optimization and Co-design Flow9.Synthesis Results

description.zh: 1. 替代燃料的介紹。2. 替代燃料的分類。3. 車輛用植物性燃料、混合燃料和金屬/液態/氣態燃料電池的種類、應用以及未來發展。
description.en: 1. Introduction of alternative fuels. 2. Classification of alternative fuels. 3. Kind, application, and future of Vegetable Fuels, Blended Fuels, Metel/Liquit/Gas Fuel Cells for Vehicles.

name.zh: 混合訊號積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在研習混合訊號積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前混合訊號CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.混合訊號設計概述 2.連續時間濾波器 3.交換電容濾波器 4.交換電流濾波器 5.數位類比轉換器 6.類比數位轉換器 7.超取樣積分三角類比數位轉換器 8.管線式類比數位轉換器 9.混合訊號積體電路佈局
description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

description.zh: 本課程著重在協助企業如何在國際間綠色浪潮的衝擊與永續發展三重盈餘之二十一世紀新經濟中競存，並能與全球永續發展的理想共存共榮。換言之，本課程主要是協助企業如何透過環境的議題，將原本可能的威脅課程轉換成機會。課程內容包括：企業環境管理與永續發展的內涵、企業環境風險管理與預防、整合性企業環境管理的做法、綠色行銷與永續消費、綠色產品設計、環境會計、環境資訊的揭露與報告、企業社會責任的內涵及做法，以及其他企業綠化的做法。
description.en: This course focuses on strategically assisting enterprises to improve their competitiveness through environmental issues while striving for sustainability in the 21st century. The contents of the course will be covering overview of corporate environmental management and sustainable development, corporate environmental risk management and prevention, green accounting, green marking and sustainable consumption, corporate social responsibility, corporate environmental disclosure and reporting, and some other subjects related to the greening of the business.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對水質化學之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括高等平衡化學、高等複合化學、高等氧化還原化學在於薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序之應用
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of water chemistry, water quality and water quality control.  The topic will include the applications of Chemical equilibrium, Redox reaction and coordination chemistry on water treatment processes such as CSF, membrane, GAC, Ion exchange and disinfection processes.

description.zh: 本課程主要以講座、研習營方式探討及演練有關生活實用科技及創意產業化之原理與實作。內容包括：生活實用科技與應用、智慧財產權與管理、數位音像設計與行銷、商業經營模式與設計管理、本土化創作與品牌經營、創意產業化與行銷。
description.en: Theory and Professional Practice on Workshop Subjects for Cultural Innovation and Business Management: （1）Applied technology for New lifestyle.（2）Intelligence property and its positioning.（3）Design and Marketing for multi-media.（4）Interaction between Business model and Design Management.（5）Indigenous works on randay.（6）Innovation Implementation and Marketing.

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.傅立葉分析 3.微波網路 4.向量網路分析儀 5.頻譜分析儀6.時域反射儀 7.向量信號分析儀 8.天線量測
description.en: 1.Introduction  2.Fourier Analysis 3.Microwave Network 4.Vector Network Analyzer 5.Spectrum Analyzer 6.Time Domain Reflectrometry 7.Vector Signal 8.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 本課程係提供防火工程有關基礎概論、設計工學手法及實務技術等理論與應用兼重的課程，以促進學生自立研討學習能力，提高教學良性互動關係，可供職場工程實務相關防火工程之重要技能與知識。內容包括：一、現行防火安全法規與性能式防火法規二、性能式防火設計基礎概論三、防止起火及火災成長有關技術四、火災探測與滅火有關技術五、控制室內外延燒擴大有關技術六、避難疏散與逃生有關技術七、煙氣控制有關技術八、構造耐火設計有關技術
description.en: The purpose of course is to provide the fundamental theory and practical technique about the fire protection engineering, encourage the establishment of self-learning ability of students and facilitate their skill and knowledge about fire protection engineering in construction job. The course covers the following subjects:1.fire safety related regulation and performance-based code in force2.fundamental theory for performance-based design3.prevention techniques about fire initiation and growth4.techniques of fire detection and extinguishment5.control techniques about interior and exterior flame-spread6.means of evacuation and escape7.techniques of smoke control8.techniques about fire resistance design of structure

name.en: Disaster Prevention Management of High Rise Buildings

description.zh: 1.高層建物之實態與傾向2.高層建物之火災災例分析3.高層建物火災時避難安全問題4.避難安全設計5.高層建物之火災安全對策6.實例研討
description.en: 1.Situation & Development of High-rise Buildings2.Analysis for High-rise Building in Fire3.Evacuation Safety on High-rise Building Fires4.Designing for Evacuation Safety5.Strategies of Fire Protection for High-rise Buildings6.Case Study

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 1. 緒論、2. 負載預測、3. 發電系統可靠度分析、4. 發電成本分析、5. 電力潮流計算與分析、6. 輸電系統可靠度分析、7. 自動化輸電系統擴展性規劃、8. 電力系統故障分析
description.en: The purpose of this course is to focus attention on 1. the overall process called power system planning and 2. the mathematical detail of various analytical tools. The nature of this course makes it a graduate-level lecture and it is opened for those who already have a basic understanding on power system.1. Introduction, 2.Load Forecasting, 3.Generation System Reliability Analysis, 4.Generation System Cost Analysis, 5.Power Flow computation and Analysis, 6.Transmission System Reliability Analysis, 7.Automated Transmission System Expansion Planning, 8.Faulty Analysis of Power System.

description.zh: 類比系統、數位系統設計、數位控制及微處理機、介面程式設計、程式語言及軟體等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Analogy systems, Digital systems designed, Digital control and microprocessors, Interface programming design, Computer programming, software and Lab.

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 1.物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2.視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL語言的使用與資料庫連結 4.智慧型演算法 5.工程實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

name.zh: 微奈米量測系統與技術

description.zh: 微奈米量測工程技術為是現代科技發展之重要前瞻技術，它將探討有效尺寸在微奈米等級範圍之精密量測儀器與技術. 本課程將涵括下列各項現代精密量測主題:1.近代光電量測系統與技術2.量測統計原理3.量測信號處理4.三次元座標量測系統與技術5.雷射干涉系統與技術6.影像量測系統與技術7.微奈米量測系統與技術-干涉術、相位移術、調變術、光共焦 及   自動聚焦術8.微奈米量測系統與技術--掃瞄探針顯微鏡(SPM), STM, AFM 及   SNOM.9.奈米粉體量測系統與技術10.量測實驗11.小型量測儀器之專題製作
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced systems and technology associated with micro- and nano-scale measurement. The subject includes the following subtopics:1.Modern opto-electro measurement systems and techniques2.Statistic principles for measurement3.Signal processing techniques4.Three-dimensional measurement systems and techniques5.Laser interferometric metrology and systems6.Image processing techniques for metrology7.Micro and nano-measurement systems and techniques (I) -   Moire interferometry, phase shifting, signal modulation,   confocal and auto-focusing techniques.8.Micro- and nano-measurement systems and techniques (II) -   SPM, STM, AFM and SNOM.9.Nano-particle measurement systems and techniques10.Student laboratory/practices11.Team project work for design and fabrication of    small-scaled measurement instrument

description.zh: 熱交換器應用、熱交換器設計簡介、熱傳分析、熱交換性能分析、熱交換器鰭片分析、熱交換器低溫應用分析
description.en: Applications of heat exchangers, introduction to heat exchanger design, heat transfer analysis, performance analysis of heat exchanger, analysis of heat exchanger fin design, analysis of low temperature applications

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維與管理知能，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域創新管理相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計創新管理相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, communication, leadership, strategy, globalization, and interdisciplinary collaboration.

description.zh: 本課程主要以講座、研習營方式探討及演練有關生活實用科技及創意產業化之原理與實作。內容包括：生活實用科技與應用、智慧財產權與管理、數位音像設計與行銷、商業經營模式與設計管理、本土化創作與品牌經營、創意產業化與行銷。
description.en: Theory and Professional Practice on Workshop Subjects for Cultural Innovation and Business Management: （1）Applied technology for New lifestyle.（2）Intelligence property and its positioning.（3）Design and Marketing for multi-media.（4）Interaction between Business model and Design Management.（5）Indigenous works on randay.（6）Innovation Implementation and Marketing.

name.zh: 流行家具設計專案研究
name.en: The Contemporary Furniture Design Project Research

description.zh: 流行家具設計專案包含家具流行趨勢研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward furniture design project focused on trend research and design practice under supervision of the director. Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive trend research.

name.en: Design Theory and Research in Germany

description.zh: 赴德研習之準備課程；科學理論、計畫理論、傳播理論、美學等創新設計實務相關之理論與研究，以建立專案研發設計之理論基礎。
description.en: This course provides theory and research of design in Germany related topics on Science Theory, Plan Theory, Communication Theory, Esthetics etc. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and simulation verification.

name.zh: 流行生活用品設計概論

description.zh: 講述知識性內容包括瞭解文化、趨勢、生活型態、科技發展等設計背景元素。介紹設計理論，深入探討產品與使用者之關係、產品使用情境與產品語言(product language)、環境因素與社會背景、產品診斷、以及非物質設計因素。
description.en: Lecture on culture study, trend, life-style and technology development. A Brief introduction to theory of design including impact of environmental factors and social background, product clinic, usability, and universal design.

description.zh: 本課程旨在研究家具設計數位化的技巧，藉由各種相關軟體與自行建立Third Party的應用，完成家具設計案虛擬實境的效果，同時以家具設計個案的實際演練，達到家具設計師與客戶間的良好溝通與充分檢討。
description.en: This course aims to study the digital techniques for furntiure design. With the related software and self-made third party applications, the furntiure design project is conducted in the form of virtual-reality. Meanwhile, through the practicing of furntiure design projects the communication between designers and clients is emphasized.

name.zh: 流行時尚與產品人類學

description.zh: 以人類學觀點，從資本主義與文化消費社會形塑過程中，考察日常生活用品之流行時尚現象，包括文化消費、身體消費、影像消費、網路消費、時髦物體系、產品與主體建構、次文化認同、後現代認同等課題之理論介紹、案例分析與產品俗民誌實習。
description.en: From the viewpoint of anthropology, this course is to inquire the fashion phenomena of everyday commodities in the context of capitalism and the formation of cultural consumption.  The contents include the introduction of theories, the case studies, and the practices of product ethnography in the aspects of cultural consumption, body consumption, image consumption, internet consumption, systems of fashion objects, 3C products and subjectivity construction, subculture identity, and post-modern identity.

name.zh: 流行時尚族群行為研究

description.zh: 代表流行文化的流行時尚族群對生活物品的設計影響深遠。本課程針對此族群的生活型態、喜好度與期望性等因素，展開隨機性或系統性觀察，並配合訪談、問卷與實驗等研究步驟作資料收集。再經由資料分析（質化與量化兼具）與歸類，整理出流行時尚族群的興趣與傾向，作為流行生活用品設計的重要參考依據。
description.en: Fashion groups representing the popular culture widely affect the design of living artifacts. This study will focus on target groups' lifestyle, preferences and desirability to undertake casual and systematic observation. Additionally, the methods of face-to-face interviews, questionnaire and experiment are used to collect data and information and tend to be analyzed with the formation of qualitative and quantitative research. The final result will provide designers as guidelines, which might identify the target group's interest and preference.

name.en: Special Topics of Universal Design in Furniture

description.zh: 全適化設計在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足每一個使用者的需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認全適化設計思維方法與實務，本課程著重於全適化設計理論在家具設計上的應用。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

name.zh: 生活資訊產品設計研究

description.zh: 隨著資訊科技的進步，資訊處理的功能被廣泛的加入到產品之中，成為典型的「互動系統」（Interaction System）。本課程重於使用者與資訊產品之間的互動介面設計。將探討到介面的使用是否容易；使用者是否能夠完成特定的工作等議題。討論的主題包括－認知模式、互動技術、符號系統、顯示螢幕的組織方式、以及數位原型建構方法。
description.en: With the progress of Information technology, the functions of information process have been added into appliance which is a typical interaction system. In the course, we will focus on issues related to interactive interface between information appliance and users. Those issues include cognition model, interactive technology, information architecture, and digital prototype.

name.zh: 流行辦公家具與空間設計研究
name.en: Special Topics in Contemporary Office Space and Furniture Re

description.zh: 從現代工作之型態去探討人、空間與家具之關係，並隨材料科技和加工技術的進步，研究現代辦公家具的趨勢及設計方向。
description.en: A general study of design trend of contemporary office furniture by examining modern work types and organization structures respectively. This course intends to utilize material improvement, new manufacturing technology and ergonomics studies to study the trends and directions of office space and furniture design.

description.zh: 圖像數位畫技術已然成熟，並朝多向度發展，深入各個應用領域。本課程重點是針對藝術與設計應用的相關技術，介紹相關的電腦圖像技術原理，並探討未來的發展趨勢。透過藝術創作與設計案例，協助學生建立對各類型數位圖像科技之整合能力。
description.en: This course is directed to discuss the theories and applications of computer graphics and the future development of the technology. The students will be provided with integrating the related technologies of computer graphics through the real design cases in digital environment.

name.zh: 特殊群族產品開發管理與實務研究
name.en: Study of Product Development Management and Practice in Prod

description.zh: 工業設計近年經被定義為人本設計，並在產品設計開發中具橫向整合的功能。然而，在特殊群族如：傷殘、老人、幼兒等產品的設計開發，常需醫療、復健、醫工、觀護及幼兒教育等該群族相關專家及專業人員的參與。本課程重點在於輔導研究生，研究與分析工業設計在該類產品設計開發中，與相關群族之專業專家之互動關係、工作及活動內容、及如何將該等工作內容有效整合於產品設計開發管理中，並作實務研究與探討。
description.en: Industrial Designer is designing products with users oriented. But designing product for the special user's group. As disable, elder and children (Infant) are mostly has been involved by specialist that has expertise on their nature.The goal of this topic is to assist Students in study and research of the relationship, activities, and their interaction between Industrial Design and the specialist which concerning the related users group. And how to integrate them into product development function, In design management and practice.

description.zh: 本課程旨在(一)探討中西傳統家具造型起源及演化；(二)研究影響各時期家具風格形成的因素，包括社會文化環境、使用材料、結構方法、裝飾手法及其象徵意義等；(三)探尋傳統設計元素在現代家具上的可能應用。
description.en: An in-depth exposure to the origins of form and the evolution of furniture design both in Oriental and Western World; Comprehensive analysis of the characteristics, including specific cultural environment, material used, construction methods, ornamentation, and Symbolism in decoration which define a period style; Study the application of traditional design elements on contemporary furniture.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

name.en: Special Topics on Characteristics of Polymers

description.zh: 介紹高分子分子結構、型態學、流變學、化學性質、熱性質、機械、電學及光學等特性之分析方法及實例。
description.en: This course will cover the examples of analysis of the mechanical, thermal, electrical, optical and chemical properties, and the structure, morphology, and rheology of polymers.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

name.en: Design Theory and Research in Germany

description.zh: 赴德研習之準備課程；科學理論、計畫理論、傳播理論、美學等創新設計實務相關之理論與研究，以建立專案研發設計之理論基礎。
description.en: This course provides theory and research of design in Germany related topics on Science Theory, Plan Theory, Communication Theory, Esthetics etc. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and simulation verification.

description.zh: 本課程是針對自然界因地質作用所引發的地質災害進行研究，尤其著重於各種地質災害的調查與分析。根據衛星影像與航照判釋、現場地質勘查與分析以及各種潛在危險災害發生率與影響性評估方法，對各種地質災害類型依發生頻率及潛在危險性，討論在區域開發上之限制與事前的整治防範。同時也分析各個地質災害案例，了解人與自然環境的互動關係。
description.en: In the past ten years, There have always been natural earth processes that are hazardous to people of Taiwan. Natural disasters such as typhoon, earthquakes, river flooding hazards, landslides, debris flow hazards and subsidences caused loss of life or property damage. These disasters made people realize that the natural processes that produce natural disasters must be recognized. They must be avoided where possible, and their threat to human life and property must be minimized. In fact, natural hazards are nothing more than natural processes. They become hazards only when people live or work in areas where these processes occur naturally. The purpose of this course is hoped to serve some methods to identify and analysis potentially hazardous processes. It is also provided some concepts and training to formulate various alternatives to avoid or minimize the threat to human life or property.

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 1. 電力科技之改革2. 世界各國電力自由化發展3. 電力交換組織架構4. 獨立系統操作組織架構5. 電力庫制度6. 損失計算7. 電價計算
description.en: 1. Revolutions of power Technologies2. The development of deregulation in the world3. Organization of power exchange4. Organization of independent system operator5. power pool6. Power wheeling7. Calculations of losses8. Calculations of electric prices

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。膜披覆製程是近年來高科技產業技術一項前途被看好的製程技術之一，廣用於刀具、模具、光學元件、感測器及半導體工業等等。此門課程將提供此項技術之介紹、相關配備、原理與能量提供方式、將包括：沉積技術與應用、化學氣相沉積法、物理氣相沉積法、電鍍技術、真空工程、直流電源、射頻電源、微波、熱燈絲等各種能量介紹、以及膜的成核與生長理論。
description.en: The technology of films coating has advanced dramatically. This advancement was driven primarily by the need for new products and devices in the electronics and optical industries etc.. The rapid progress in various devices would not have been possible without the development of new files coating technology, improved film characteristic and superior file qualities. This course is intended to serve us a guide for the student or practitioner in the field, as a review and overview of this rapidly evolving technology for the graduate students in several branches of science and engineering.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 繞射光學元件是基於光波繞射的原理，以VLSI技術為加工方法，研究如何利用繞射現象設計光學元件來實現各種光學功能。繞射光學元件可以應用在改良光學系統的像差，為特定的波長實現聚光、分光等功能以取代傳統的光學透鏡、分光鏡等，此外利用傅光原理製作出傳統的光學元件無法實現的功能，在近代的光學系統、尤其是微光學系統佔有極重要的地位。本課程中，我們將討論其基本原理、設計方法、以及應用。主要課程內容為：(1)光學繞射原理(2)傅式光學概論(3)繞射光學元件介紹(4)性能分析方法(5)繞射光學元件之設計方法(6)繞射光學元件之應用(7)繞射光學元件之製作
description.en: Diffractive optical element (DOE) is based on optical wavefront diffraction on a phase profile that is commonly generated by VLSI techniques. DOE's can be applied on conventional optical systems as well as advanced opto-electronic systems. In this course, we will discuss in detail the basic pricioples, design methods, and others about DOE's. The following topics will be introduced:(1)Introduction to Diffraction theory(2)Overview of Fourier optics(3)Diffractive optical elements (DOE's)(4)Performance evaluation of DOE's(5)Design methods for DOE's(6)Applications of DOE's(7)Fabrication tecjniqies of DOE's

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含:社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學。 1.基本電磁理論 2.介質介面的電磁波反射及穿透 3.板式波導 4.實際的波導型式   5.光介質波導內之傳播、調制及振盪 6.光纖 7.諧振盪及耦合器 8.分布回饋式元件
description.en: 1. Basic electromagnetic theory 2.Reflection and transmission of plane waves at a dielectric interface 3.The slab waveguides 4.Practical waveguide geometries 5.Optical fibers 6.Propagation, modulation, and oscillation in optical dielectric waveguide 7.Resonators and couplers 8.Distributed feedback structures

name.en: Principle and designing of semiconductor lighting

description.zh: (1)半導體物理與發光原理(2)半導體材料特性(3)元件結構設計(4)元件構裝技術(5)應用與發展
description.en: (1) Semiconductor physics and lighting principle (2) Characteristics of Semiconductor material (3) Structure designing of device (4) Package technology of device (5)Application and development

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.傅立葉分析 3.微波網路 4.向量網路分析儀 5.頻譜分析儀6.時域反射儀 7.向量信號分析儀 8.天線量測
description.en: 1.Introduction  2.Fourier Analysis 3.Microwave Network 4.Vector Network Analyzer 5.Spectrum Analyzer 6.Time Domain Reflectrometry 7.Vector Signal 8.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬與合金凝固之基本理論以及它的應用與控制,由熱流動,質量傳輸以及成核與晶体成長來討論凝固機制。
description.en: The course of solidification principles dealing with the fundamentals of metal and alloy solidification and how to relate these fundamentals to practice and control. Based upon the fundamentals of heat flow mass transport and nucleation crystal growth to discuss about solidification mechanisms. This course is suitable for senior-level and graduate students.

description.zh: 研究虛擬學習系統組成要素的發展背景、現況與未來，並探就不同生涯階段的學習者，運用虛擬學習系統的成功學習策略。
description.en: In-depth study of the fields of virtual learning. Topics include the components of virtual learning systems, development background, current status and perspective of virtual learning. Exploration of successful strategies for learners' using virtual learning systems in different career stages.

name.zh: 資訊技術在醫學工程之應用
name.en: Applies Information Technologies to Medical Engineering

description.zh: 1.醫療資訊標準 2.醫療儀器設計 3.遠距醫療系統 4.遠距照護系統 5.數位訊號處理在醫工之應用 6.PACS的設計與規則 7.輔助設計
description.en: 1.Medical Informations Standards 2.Medical Instrument Design 3.Telemedicine System 4.Telecare System 5.Digital Image Processing in Medical Engineering 6.Design & Plan of Picture Achieving and Communications System 7.Help System Design for Disable

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 超低溫冷凍通常指進行在-100℃以下特定低溫範圍之冷凍技術應用，譬如高能能物理同步輻射冷卻，生物醫學胚胎冷凍保存，大型超低溫冷能氣化發電廠與中、長程飛彈推進系統冷卻技術等，現代微系統科技多方面高層次應用上之必要技術。故如何進行實質而有效整合超低溫系統技術，是決定未來國力競爭之主要關鍵項目。本課程主要內容將涵蓋：1. 多段多元化自動冷卻系統技術。2. .超低溫循環冷媒特性。3. 生物基因晶化冷凍技術應用。4. 系統裝置之材料選擇。5. 電子微觀系統應用。6. 超低溫冷卻劑之檢測與分析。
description.en: At the completion will have learned of this course:1. Multiple stage and cascade refrigeration systems technology.2. Refrigerant characteristics for low-temperature cycle.3. Biomedical applications of cryogenic refrigeration.4. Choice of low-temperature materials for refrigeration systems.5. Research applications of electron microscopy.6. Refrigerant properties of super low-temperature coolants.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

description.zh: 應用光學：使學生了解”光機電整合”系統中光學部份的基本原理光系統元件特性與應用、內容包括；幾何光學，雷射光束傳播，干涉繞射理論，偏極光特性，電光效應，聲光效應，光纖的導波特性，光纖在感測上的應用。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to provide student of fundamental concepts, techniques and applications of otics in a Opto-Electronic integrated system.It may include the theories of geometric options, the propagation of laser beam,the difraction and interference of light,the characteristis of coherence and polarization, the effents of the Electro-Optic, Magneto-optic modulation,the optical properties of waveguide and optic-fibre,and the applications of optical fibre sensor.

description.zh: 一.發展商務決策系統，包括：1.DSS架構 2.DSS硬體 3.DSS軟體 4.DSS模式 5.GDSS模式 二、資料倉儲 三、智慧型代理人 四、資訊分享 五、OLAP 六、OLTP 七、Sales force automation
description.en: Development and application of decision support systems for commerce including DSS architecture, hardware, software tools, models in DSS and group DSS. Recent development and application of intelligent systems including data warehousing, intelligent agent, information sharing, on-line analysis processing and sales force automation using Web technologies. Development of an intelligent commerce system using Microsoft SQL Server.

name.en: The study of living environment for elderly

description.zh: 隨著醫學科技及飲食習慣的改善，人類壽命不斷延長，在已開發國家中高齡化社會早已形成。為使高齡者有優良的生活環境，對此研究已刻不容緩，此為本課程之重點。高齡者居住環境包含室內空間佈局、家具、電源、電化製品及衛浴設備之使用安全及方便性，室外空間之休閒設施、進出行動之安全考量，均為本課題之探討範圍。
description.en: With the advance of medical technology and the improvement of the eating habit, people's life expectancy tends to be extended.  The aging society has been already formed in most developed countries.  How to improve the living environment for aged people is considered to be one of the most urgent topics in design.  This course aims to study the living environment of aged people.The safety and usability issues for the interior layout, furniture design, electric power facilities, household appliance, bathroom facilities and outdoors recreation facilities are studied.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 引擎及主要控制系統介紹，引擎動力系統之數學模式（含進氣系統、油路系統、點火系統、廢氣排放系統），閉迴路空燃比控制，爆震控制，引擎怠速之控制，引擎等速之控制，引擎加速／減速調整。
description.en: Introduction of Engine and Main Control System, Mathematical Model of Engine Dynamic System (Including Inlet System, Oil-Loop System, Ignition System, Exhaust System), Closed-Loop Air-Fuel Ratio Control, Detonation Control, Engine Idle Speed Control, Engine Cruising Speed Control, Engine Acceleration/Deceleration Regulation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.光資訊處理系統 2.全像光學資訊儲存 3.DVD光碟機資訊儲存 4.CCD類比光學記憶體 5.數位相機
description.en: 1.Optical information processing system 2.Holograph memory 3.DVD optical storage disk 4.Analog CCD optical memory 5.Digital camera

description.zh: 內容包括材料彈塑性變形，差排，高溫變形，低溫拉伸破壞，高溫破壞及疲勞。
description.en: The contents include elastic and plastic deformation in materials，dislocations，high temperature deformation，tensile fracture at low temperature，high temperature fracture and fatigue。

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解車輛省油不單純只是引擎燃燒性能或機構的改良而已，且另一個對車輛省油有重要貢獻的手段便是車輛的傳動系統技術的改良，此先進改良的方式增加學生對傳動系統重要性的認識。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of power train system, the relationship between engine and power train system, and the mechanical design of power train system. The purpose of this study is to increase the students' understanding in power train system.

description.zh: 1.傳輸線2.散射參數3.微波主動元件4.寬頻放大電路5.低雜訊放大電路6.功率放大器7.高穩定振盪器8.壓控振盪器9.鎖相迴路10.混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 類神經網路（ANN）應用2-1 ANN基礎2-2 類神經網路3. 模糊邏輯基礎3-1 模糊邏輯基礎3-2 模糊控制應用4. 基因演算法4-1 概述4-2 基因演算法在控制器調制之應用
description.en: 1 Introduction2 Application of artificial neural networks (ANN)2-1 ANN fundamentals2-2 Neur-control3 Fuzzy logic control3-1 Fuzzy logic basics3-2 Application of Fuzzy Control4 Genetic algorithms4-1 Preliminarg    4-2 Tuning of Controllers using genetic algorithms

description.zh: 1. 電力系統經濟調度2. 傳輸損失3. 機組規劃4. 水火力機組協調5. 發電控制6. 電力系統互聯7. 電力系統安全度8. 狀態評估
description.en: 1. Economic dispatch of power system2. transmission losses3. Unit commitment4. coordination of hydro-thermal generators5. generation control6. inter-connected power systems7. Security of power system8. State estimation

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.
